title: About the Liberation War Archive
description: About the Liberation War Archive: The Liberation War Archive is a dedicated online platform that preserves and shares the historical records of Bangladesh's Liberation War of 1971. It serves as an invaluable resource for researchers, historians, and the general public, offering a comprehensive collection of documents, interviews, photographs, and testimonials. Our mission is to preserve and document this rich history of the Liberation War, to provide academic, cultural, and historical preservation and research. It honors the freedom fighters who sacrificed everything for independence and ensures that future generations understand what took place in the defining historical documents, official treaties, declarations, and correspondence.
